NPC/AddEntityRelationship.description: Makes the NPC like, hate, feel neutral towards, or fear the entity in question. If you want to setup relationship towards a certain entity

NPC/AddRelationship.description: Changes how an NPC feels towards another NPC. If you want to setup relationship towards a certain

NPC/AlertSound.description: Force an NPC to play his Alert sound.

NPC/CapabilitiesAdd.description: Adds a capability to the NPC.

NPC/CapabilitiesClear.description: Removes all of Capabilities the NPC has.

NPC/CapabilitiesGet.description: Returns the NPC's capabilities along the ones defined on its weapon.

NPC/Classify.description: Returns the NPC class. Do not confuse with

NPC/ClearEnemyMemory.description: Clears the Enemy from the NPC's memory, effectively forgetting it until met again with either the NPC vision or with

NPC/ClearExpression.description: Clears the NPC's current expression which can be set with

NPC/ClearSchedule.description: Stops the current schedule that the NPC is doing.

NPC/ConditionName.description: Translates condition ID to a string.

NPC/Disposition.description: Returns the way the NPC "feels" about the entity.

NPC/ExitScriptedSequence.description: Makes an NPC exit a scripted sequence, if one is playing.

NPC/FearSound.description: Force an NPC to play his Fear sound.

NPC/FoundEnemySound.description: Force an NPC to play its FoundEnemy sound.

NPC/GetActiveWeapon.description: Returns the weapon the NPC is currently carrying, or

NPC/GetAimVector.description: Returns the aim vector of the NPC. NPC alternative of

NPC/GetArrivalActivity.description: Returns the activity to be played when the NPC arrives at its goal

NPC/GetCurrentWeaponProficiency.description: Returns how proficient (skilled) an NPC is with its current weapon.

NPC/GetEnemy.description: Returns the entity that this NPC is trying to fight

NPC/GetExpression.description: Returns the expression file the NPC is currently playing.

NPC/GetHullType.description: Returns NPCs hull type set by

NPC/GetMovementActivity.description: Returns the NPC's current movement activity.

NPC/GetMovementSequence.description: Returns the index of the sequence the NPC uses to move.

NPC/GetShootPos.description: Returns the shooting position of the NPC.

NPC/Give.description: Used to give a weapon to an already spawned NPC.

NPC/HasCondition.description: Returns whether or not the NPC has the given condition.

NPC/IdleSound.description: Force an NPC to play his Idle sound.

NPC/IsCurrentSchedule.description: Returns whether or not the NPC is performing the given schedule.

NPC/IsMoving.description: Returns whether the NPC is moving or not.

NPC/IsUnreachable.description: Returns whether the entity given can be reached by this NPC.

NPC/LostEnemySound.description: Force an NPC to play his LostEnemy sound.

NPC/MarkEnemyAsEluded.description: Causes the NPC to temporarily forget the current enemy and switch on to a better one.

NPC/NavSetGoalTarget.description: Set the goal target for an NPC.

NPC/NavSetWanderGoal.description: Sets a goal in x, y offsets for the npc to wander to

NPC/PlaySentence.description: Forces the NPC to play a sentence from scripts/sentences.txt

NPC/SetCurrentWeaponProficiency.description: Sets the weapon proficiency of an NPC (how skilled an NPC is with its current weapon).

NPC/SetEnemy.description: Sets the target for an NPC.

NPC/SetExpression.description: Sets the NPC's .vcd expression. Similar to

NPC/SetHullSizeNormal.description: Updates the NPC's hull and physics hull in order to match its model scale.

NPC/SetHullType.description: Sets the hull type for the NPC.

NPC/SetLastPosition.description: Sets the last registered or memorized position for an npc. When using scheduling, the NPC will focus on navigating to the last position via nodes.

NPC/SetMovementActivity.description: Sets the activity the NPC uses when it moves.

NPC/SetMovementSequence.description: Sets the sequence the NPC navigation path uses for speed calculation. Doesn't seem to have any visible effect on NPC movement.

NPC/SetNPCState.description: Sets the state the NPC is in to help it decide on a ideal schedule.

NPC/SetTarget.description: Sets the NPC's target to a player.(Used in some engine schedules)

NPC/StartEngineTask.description: Forces the NPC to start an engine task, this has different results for every NPC.

NPC/StopMoving.description: Resets the NPC's movement animation and velocity. Does not actually stop the NPC from moving.

NPC/UpdateEnemyMemory.description: Force the NPC to update information on the supplied enemy, as if it had line of sight to it.
